fields.name: color
javadoc: The color index used to draw the blocks of this material on maps.

fields.name: pushReaction
javadoc: Mobility information flag. 0 indicates that this block is normal, 1 indicates that it can't push other blocks, 2 indicates that it can't be pushed.

methods.name: blocksMotion
javadoc: Returns if this material is considered solid or not

methods.name: getColor
javadoc: Retrieves the color index of the block. This is is the same color used by vanilla maps to represent this block.

methods.name: isFlammable
javadoc: Returns if the block can burn or not.

methods.name: isLiquid
javadoc: Returns if blocks of these materials are liquids.

methods.name: isReplaceable
javadoc: Returns whether the material can be replaced by other blocks when placed - eg snow, vines and tall grass.

methods.name: isSolid
javadoc: Returns true if the block is a considered solid. This is true by default.

methods.name: isSolidBlocking
javadoc: Indicate if the material is opaque
